ee:transform.doc:name: Set Correlation Id And Input Payload

logger.doc:name: Start Log
logger.message: transactionId: #[vars.transactionId], correlationId: #[vars.correlationId], The flow to update covid case started: #[vars.inputPayload]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/json var actionDate=now() as String{format: "yyyy-MM-dd"} var owner="UHIS" --- { case_id: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.caseId, source: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.source, case_type: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.caseType, first_name: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.firstName, last_name: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.lastName, phone: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.phone, email: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.email, date_of_birth: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.dateOfBirth, national_id: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.nationalId, national_id_type: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.nationalIdType, street_address: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.address.streetAddress, city: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.address.city, state: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.address.state, postal: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.address.postal, country: vars.inputPayload.covidCase.address.country, update_date: actionDate, create_by: owner, update_by: owner }

logger.doc:name: End Log
logger.message: transactionId: #[vars.transactionId], correlationId: #[vars.correlationId], The flow to update covid case completed: #[vars.inputPayload]
